Discover KTH’s courses with ease and plan your academic journey with precision using our intuitive platform.

Try the App Now! Explore courses in seconds!
View on GitHub

About the Project

Course Compass is a cutting-edge web application designed to empower students in navigating KTH’s course offerings. With an intuitive interface, students can search courses, check prerequisites, and discover eligible courses by uploading their academic transcripts. Ready to explore? Try it out now!

Currently tailored for KTH, our vision is to expand to other universities, creating a versatile platform for students worldwide to explore, compare, and plan their academic journeys with confidence.

Key Features

Course Search

Search and filter KTH courses by subject, level, and prerequisites.

Transcript Upload

Upload transcripts for personalized course recommendations.

Intuitive Design

Simple, user-friendly interface for seamless course discovery.

Open-Source

Community-driven, regularly updated with new features.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I use the app?

Visit our app, upload your transcript, and explore courses tailored to your academic profile.

Is it free to use?

Yes, Course Compass is completely free for all KTH students.

Can I use it for other universities?

Currently, the app is designed for KTH courses, but we’re working on expanding to other universities soon!

How secure is my data?

We prioritize your privacy. All uploaded transcripts are securely processed and not stored after analysis.
